name: AntCapitalist
description:
You start with nothing. You can borrow some money and buy some ants. They will work for you.

CONTROL

  • Click an ant and press UP, DOWN, LEFT or RIGHT to tell him where to go in the next turn.
  • Press SPACE to leave it where it is.
  • One tile can accommodate only one ant.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Borrow some money and you will get debt. The more you borrow, the more you pay back.
  • Buy a ordinary ant.
  • It will appear at random.
  • Ordinary ant.
  • It will evolve into a defender, when there are 2 ordinary ants around it.
  • It will die, when there are more than 3 ants around it.
  • It will die ,when there are a rogue ant around it.
  • Defender.
  • An empty tile will generate a factory in the next turn, when there are 3 defenders around it.
  • It can kill the rogue ant which around it. Also it will die.
  • Factory.
  • Increase your money each turn.
  • The factory will be destroyed, when the ants walk towards it.
  • Rogue ant.
  • It can kill the ant, which around it.
  • It will die, when it kill a defender.
  • It want to destroy your factory.

WIN AND LOSS

  • You will win, when your money exceeds your debt.
  • You will loss, when your debt is 300 more than your money. Or there are some rogue ants and you don’t have any ants.

FINALLY

  • Thanks for you playing.
  • I’m very pleased with your feedback.
